quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Jiangsu Zenergy Battery Technologies Group Co., Ltd. - H Shs
quote.nm: Jiangsu Zenergy Battery Technologies Group Co., Ltd. - H Shs
quote.summary: Jiangsu Zenergy Battery Technologies Group Co Ltd is a China-based company principally engaged in research, development, production and sales of electric vehicle battery products, energy storage system battery products and aviation battery products. The Company provides integrated battery solutions, encompassing battery cells, modules, packs, racks, and battery management systems. The Company’s energy storage system and marine battery products are primarily lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries, and aviation battery products are primarily high-nickel semi-solid-state Lithium-Ion battery products. The Company’s batteries cover a variety of electric vehicle types, such as battery electric vehicle (BEV), plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV), extended-range electric vehicle (EREV) and hybrid electric vehicle (HEV). The Company mainly conducts its businesses in the domestic market.
